main event: A UFO sighting was reported over Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania on November 24, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 50 feet in diameter, white in color and appeared flattened and elongated., It made a slight whistling noise as it went out of sight at a speed of 60 miles per hour., Observers noted the object was stationary while an aircraft flew into and obscured it., The object changed colors from reddish-orange to white during the observation., Binoculars were used to view the object, although the magnification power was unknown.
